about_the_game: This game is a nostalgic pixel-style racing game where players control their car using the ASDW keys. Before starting, players can choose their preferred vehicle model, then enter the map to begin racing. In this pixel-constructed world, there are not only standard tracks but also lush grasslands, offering a diverse driving environment. Players can drive freely, experiencing the thrill of speeding on different terrains. The game's visuals are simple yet charming, with vibrant pixel art that is instantly memorable. The background music is dynamic and energetic, complemented by the sound effects of the car accelerating, creating a tense and exciting racing atmosphere. Whether you're seeking the thrill of speed or enjoying the unique charm of the pixel world, this game meets your needs, bringing back the joy of classic games.

name: Demonstrate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows®10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-10400 or Intel® Core™ i3-12100 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1660(VRAM 6GB) or AMD Radeon™ RX 5500 XT(VRAM 8GB)
